name: Focus Outline
description: Keyboard focus visualization outline with theming support.

use: you need a consistent focus ring around custom widgets.
avoid: default focus styles already meet your requirements.

examples.minimal:
FocusOutline(
  focused: isFocused,
  child: const Text('Focusable'),
)

theming: `FocusOutlineTheme` controls align offsets and border styling.
accessibility: Keep focus rings visible for keyboard users.
do: Use focus outlines on custom interactive widgets.
dont: Hide focus rings without providing alternatives.
